Mighty Mouse?

DarkMouse::
"You got a point. Let's go and help them out."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, JP3884@a... wrote:
>     Paralysis faced the mighty mouse. "Well, Megatron had abandoned 
them and 
> fled. Right now there scattered, with no leader, and there under 
massive 
> attack. The least we could do is cover them until they organized 
and then we 
> can return here....from here I guess we'll start a counter attack. 
They have 
> no choice, they follow us or they...um....perish."
